title: Drawing, Two Roundels with Victories in Chariots; River Victory, 1798–1800
title_raw: Two Roundels with Victories in Chariots; River Victory
medium: Pen and brown ink over traces of graphite on light blue paper
inscribed: Inscribed: vitoria dei fiumi. At bottom: vitoria di della nautica.
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of various donors
description: Chariot of Victory, who holds reed, is directed toward right in swampy county. Chariot of Victory holding quadrant directed toward left. Nostral column shown in background.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, Two Roundels with Victories in Chariots; River Victory, 1798–1800. Pen and brown ink over traces of graphite on light blue paper. 
Museum purchase through gift of various donors. 1901-39-3305.
